turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Hey, I'd like to place an order for pick up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get that at the Milpitas store on Calaveras Boulevard.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which store was that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one in Milpitas, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, but which restaurant are you trying to order form?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm trying to order from the Peet's Coffee in Milpitas, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what drink did you want from peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a large cafe latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a milk preference for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, whole milk if you would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrups in that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but could I have some sugar in the bag?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can include that in your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And how much is that going to cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you want a large Cafe Au Lait with whole milk, please include sugar in the bag.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the cost is $3.45.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yes please, you can go ahead and place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Peet's in Milpitas. it should be ready for pick up in 6 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, that's all. Thanks very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.
